statements: SELECT player_id, player_name, total_items FROM player_inventory;
SELECT player_name, total_items, player_id FROM player_inventory;
SELECT total_items, player_id, player_name FROM player_inventory;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory;
SELECT player_name, player_id, total_items FROM player_inventory;
SELECT player_name, total_items FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE total_items > 100 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_items FROM player_inventory WHERE total_items BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_items FROM player_inventory WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' AND total_items < 50;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_items FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM PlayerInventory;
SELECT player_id, inventory_items FROM PlayerInventory WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM PlayerInventory ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ItemCollection;
SELECT collection_id, collection_items FROM ItemCollection WHERE collection_id = 'a7f98a2a-3e76-4e90-bb04-95140db082e6';
SELECT * FROM PlayerInventory WHERE player_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT player_id, jsonb_array_elements_text(inventory_items) AS item FROM PlayerInventory
SELECT player_id, COUNT(jsonb_array_elements(inventory_items)) AS total_items FROM PlayerInventory GROUP BY player_id
SELECT * FROM ItemCollection ORDER BY collection_id DESC
SELECT collection_id, jsonb_array_elements_text(collection_items) AS item_name FROM ItemCollection WHERE collection_id = '87654321-4321-8765-4321-876543218765'
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_description FROM items ORDER BY item_value DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id JOIN items ON player_inventory.item_id = items.item_id;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE item_value > 100;
SELECT player_name, player_experience FROM players WHERE player_experience < 5000 ORDER BY player_name ASC;

SELECT p.player_name, i.item_name, pi.quantity FROM players p INNER JOIN player_inventory pi ON p.player_id = pi.player_id INNER JOIN items i ON pi.item_id = i.item_id WHERE pi.quantity > 0 ORDER BY p.player_name DESC, i.item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM players ORDER BY player_level ASC, player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, experience_points FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id JOIN items ON player_inventory.item_id = items.item_id;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_value > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT collection_name, item_name, item_description FROM item_collections JOIN items ON item_collections.item_id = items.item_id;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_value > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id JOIN items ON player_inventory.item_id = items.item_id;
SELECT collection_name, item_name, item_description FROM item_collections JOIN items ON item_collections.item_id = items.item_id;
SELECT player_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_items FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM item WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE gold > 1000;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_description FROM item ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, slot_id, item_id FROM inventory_slot WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_id FROM player ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_id, experience, gold FROM player_statistics WHERE experience > 1000 AND gold < 5000;
